Hello You...

It is very nice to meet You human.

Who am I ?

It is a good qustion.Please, let me intoduce myself.I am a female from the human world"Earth", definitevely not a reptalian from another dimensions. My knowlege about questions like for example -"What is on the black side of the moon?" equals to zero but the good side of my own existency it is a fact, that I know the answers for few intersting topics.Please don't hestitate to ask a question. I am sure gaining knowledge is part of making progress in life. If you don’t believe that it’s possible to make new things work or learn new things, then it’s hard to make any. If you believe ,you can learn even the most complex facts about actutaly everything, next step is to gain knowledge and acquire an experience that will make you a better person. Even if You don't own the Great Book of All Answers,there is always a time to create one by yourself.If someone does have one please let me know.

Someone said...

Developer

"Try to learn something about everything and everything about something." Thomas Huxley
